markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Recall Ammunition](/Actions.aspx?ID=924) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Spellshot" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=414" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 140 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Trigger** You miss with a firearm or crossbow Strike.

</column>

---

You amplify the connection between bullet and firearm, calling your missed shot back into your gun. The ammunition you just fired is reloaded back into your gun and immediately ready to fire again.
name: Recall Ammunition
